text: Warri Sooriyaa yommuu ba始anitti Yoo始aashin akka malee madeessanii ni deeman. Qondaaltonni isaas sababii inni ilma Yehooyaadaa lubichaa ajjeeseef isatti mari始atanii siree isaa irratti isa ajjeesan. Kanaafuu inni du始ee Magaalaa Daawit keessatti ni awwaalame; garuu iddoo awwaala moototaatti hin awwaalamne.
